member.name: T:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack
member.summary: A track in an emulsion layer that can be identified through its number.

member.name: F:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack.m_Id
member.summary: Member data on which the Id property relies. Can be accessed by derived classes.

member.name: M:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack.#ctor
member.summary: Protected constructor. Prevents user from creating MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack objects without deriving the class. Is implicitly called in the constructors of derived classes.

member.name: M:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack.#ctor(SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack,System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds a new MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack from a MIPEmulsionTrack with the specified id.
member.param: the MIPEmulsionTrack that supplies the track information.
the track identification number.

member.name: M:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack.#ctor(SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo,SySal.Tracking.Grain[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds a new MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack from a MIPEmulsionTrackInfo, an array of grains and with the specified id.
member.param: the MIPEmulsionTrackInfo that supplies the track information.
the array of Grains.
the track identification number.

member.name: P:SySal.Scanning.MIPIndexedEmulsionTrack.Id
member.summary: Id of the track, e.g. its sequential number in the emulsion layer.

member.name: P:SySal.Scanning.Plate.IO.OPERA.RawData.Fragment.Id
member.summary: Scanning zone identifier. It is identical for all fragments in a scanning zone.

member.name: P:SySal.Scanning.Plate.IO.OPERA.RawData.Fragment.Index
member.summary: The fragment index. Ranges from 1 to the total number of fragments in the scanning zone. 0 is reserved to indicate null fragment.

member.name: P:SySal.Scanning.Plate.IO.OPERA.RawData.Fragment.StartView
member.summary: The number of the first view in this fragment in the sequential order in which they have been scanned in the scanning zone. Is 0 for the first view of the first fragment, N at the second fragment, 2N at the third and so on, where N is the total number of views in a fragment.

member.summary: The coding mode of this fragment.
